highScores - Variable in class de.htw.battleship.HighScores
 
HighScores - Class in de.htw.battleship
An instance of this class represents a high score list and is basically just a wrapper for an ArrayList of type Score with the possibility to add items, keep the List at a certain length, print the High Score List to the console and export the High Score List as a string.
HighScores() - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.HighScores
Generate a new empty HighScores object
HighScores(ArrayList<Score>) - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.HighScores
Generate a new HighScores object based on a saved high score list

hitsShip(Vector2d) - Method in class de.htw.battleship.AI
